body.name: Himalaya Damage Repair Protein Conditioner, to Deep Condition and Repair Hair, 6.76 Fl Oz (200ml)

features: WITH YARROW AND MUNG BEAN: With conditioning flavonoids, polyphenols and proteins that strengthen the hair and leave it looking nourished and strong.
IDEAL FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: Provides intensive conditioning for dry, frizzy or damaged hair. Helps gently repair today, and protects your hair from future damage.
FOR GREAT-FEELING, HEALTHY-LOOKING HAIR: Enjoy the sensory pleasure of a gentle and effective conditioner that softens, shines, and is non-drying on your hair.
NOURISHING OILS SUPPORT BOTH HAIR & SCALP: Includes a light blend of essential oils that revive tired, dull hair and provide deep, non-greasy moisture to the hair shaft and scalp.
CRUELTY FREE: We care about our furry friends. That’s why we never test our personal care products on animals.
body.description: Himalaya's Damage Repair Protein Conditioner provides intensive conditioning for dry, frizzy or damaged hair. Formulated with the extracts of protein-rich herbs, it provides necessary nourishment to hair, leaving it silky, smooth and healthy. This conditioner gently repairs, strengthens and protects your hair from future damage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: While riding through the forests of Burma, our founder, Mr. M. Manal, saw a villager pacify a restless elephant by feeding it the root of the plant Rauwolfia serpentina. Fascinated by the plant's effect on the elephant, he returned home to India to seek scientific evidence for why this particular plant would have such a beneficial, calming effect. Young Manal's mother gave him her bangles to sell so he could pursue his work, and Himalaya was born. Once he fully understood the science behind this special botanical, Mr. Manal bought a hand-operated, tablet-compressing machine and began his work. At night, his shoulders would ache from producing a few hundred tablets, one small tablet at a time. But his hard work paid off. This remarkable plant would later become Serpina, the anti-hypertensive drug in 1934. Himalaya’s legacy has always been one of researching nature and using the tools of modern science to develop and produce Ayurveda-based, pharmaceutical-grade herbal medicine products. And today, that legacy continues. Mr. Manal had a vision of helping people be well. Today, Himalaya Herbal Healthcare has turned a time-honored herbal tradition into a complete range of contemporary, proprietary formulas and single herbs dedicated to making the world well one person at a time. Since 1930, Himalaya has been passionate about the healing wisdom of herbs. We offer a wide range of herbal supplements, toothpaste and personal care products that unlock the powerful healing benefits of herbs.

While riding through the forests of Burma, our founder, Mr. M. Manal, saw a villager pacify a restless elephant by feeding it the root of the plant Rauwolfia serpentina. Fascinated by the plant's effect on the elephant, he returned home to India to seek scientific evidence for why this particular plant would have such a beneficial, calming effect. Young Manal's mother gave him her bangles to sell so he could pursue his work, and Himalaya was born. Since 1930, Himalaya has been passionate about the healing wisdom of herbs. We offer a wide range of herbal supplements, toothpaste and personal care products that unlock the powerful healing benefits of herbs.

Damage Repair Protein Conditioner Himalaya’s Damage Repair Protein Conditioner provides intensive conditioning for dry, frizzy or damaged hair. Enriched with the extracts of protein-rich herbs, it provides necessary nourishment to hair, leaving it silky, smooth and healthy. This conditioner gently , strengthens and protects your hair from damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Makes hair feel very soft and manageable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2017
reviews.reviewText: wow great conditioner , it's just awesome. I use both shampoo and conditioner, also I'm allergic to a lot of things which is why I went all Himalaya products, I stopped using my regular hair cream, but my hair went all over the place, so I came up with the idea , after my shower I dab just a small pinch of conditioner and use it like hair cream, does wonders for my hair and it looks great and a has a shine that makes hair look great all day, woo hoo I use anything Himalaya, toothpaste is awesome, and I sleep like a rock now,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shiny and smooth hair
reviews.reviewText: My hair always looks great after using this conditioner -- it makes it shiny and sleek. It normally is fly away and wispy; this conditioner changes the structure of my hair. I will keep on using it. I just received their shampoo but have not used it yet. I gave it four stars instead of five because it contains some artificial ingredients; however, without them, the product may not work as well. It also is easy to use....I just put it on after shampooing and leave it on my hair only for one minute. If you want a smooth look, this should work for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have reordered this product don’t even remember how many times. Leaves my hair super soft n silky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner works well, however the smell is overpowering

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far is good!
reviews.reviewText: So far—so good!! Is my first time trying this product for the hair. I purchase many of their supplements, thought I try this. Their hair oil is great!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I finally found the perfect conditioner
reviews.reviewText: No lie- this actually makes my hair feel soft.My hair is generally dry and brittle and crunchyI have tried so many different conditioners based on the reviews I read. Unfortunately I ended up throwing most in the garbage. This conditioner does NOT disappoint

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely great conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I discovered this delicious conditioner after living abroad. I was waiting for it to become available on Amazon, and I was so excited to see it again. Although it smells differently, my hair still loves it!!!
This product is amazing !!! I have very very dry hair and this stuff is like the miracle I needed !!!
Love this conditioner ! I use purple shampoo and live in Canada so my hair gets dry easily but this stuff instantly moisturizers and repairs my hair and leaves my fair soft and silky
The info says no parabens but the ingredients on the bottle say methylparaben and propylparaben- false advertising.
